citation: Proclamation under the Conveyancing Amendment Act (No. 2) 2012 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Conveyancing Amendment Act (No. 2) 2012

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Conveyancing Amendment Act (No. 2) 2012 fix 1 May 2015 as the day on which that Act commences.

16 March 2015

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

DR. VANESSA GOODWIN

Minister for Justice

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 25 March 2015

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
